text: Gateway Episode : “ Chapter 1 : Not If, How ” More than a decade ago, Bill Simmons cross - pollinated sports and pop culture and launched The B. S. Report at ESPN, the predecessor of The Bill Simmons Podcast. Early on — The B. S. Report predates Marc Maron ’ s WTF by two years — Simmons grasped that an uninterrupted, long - form interview scarcely existed in the media wasteland. He took note of the diminishing returns of what celebrities and athletes were willing to say and the disgust fans had for sound bites and puff pieces.
